sch:schema.title: CTX: 40106: Laboratory Schematron - Sharing Laboratory Results

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires cda:realmCode element in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.4)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found cda:realmCode element in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.4) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires valid cda:code in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.5.1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found valid cda:code in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.5.1) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires cda:confidentialityCode code=N or R or V and codeSystem= 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.7)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found cda:confidentialityCode code=N or R or V and codeSystem= 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.7) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires cda:versionNumber shall be integer in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.9)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found cda:versionNumber as integer in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.9) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires cda:assignedCustodian/cda:representedCustodianOrganization/cda:id element in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.13)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found cda:assignedCustodian/cda:representedCustodianOrganization/cda:id element in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.13) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires cda:id if cda:informationRecipient/cda:intendedRecipient present in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.14)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found cda:informationRecipient/cda:intendedRecipient/cda:id in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.14) (PASS)

sch:assert.test: not(count(cda:documentationOf/cda:serviceEvent)=0 and not(cda:code[@code='11502-2' and @codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1'] or cda:code[@code='197431000000109' and @codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.2.1.3.2.4.15']))

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: cda:documentationOf/cda:serviceEvent SHALL be present for SINGLE laboratory report (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 6.19)
ERR: Require up to two levels of sections. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: NOT Found more than two levels of sections (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7) (PASS)
sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Require one or more sections. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found one of more sections (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.1) (PASS)
sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: specialty sections SHALL NOT be nested (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: specialty sections are not nested in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.1) (PASS)
sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Invalid section cda:code in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.2)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found valid section cda:code in cda:ClinicalDocument (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.2) (PASS)

sch:assert.test: (count(cda:component/cda:section) >= 1 and not(cda:text)) or (cda:text and normalize-space(cda:text)!='') and count(cda:component/cda:section) =0

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: specialty sections SHALL have EITHER one or more component elements OR one text block with non-blank text (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.2)

sch:report.test: (count(cda:component/cda:section) >= 1 and not(cda:text)) or (cda:text and normalize-space(cda:text)!='') and count(cda:component/cda:section) =0

sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: specialty sections has EITHER one or more component elements OR one text block with non-blank text (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.1.2) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires a MANDATORY text block with non-blank text. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.3)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found a MANDATORY text block with non-blank text. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.3) (PASS)
sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires a MANDATORY code element in leaf sections (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.3)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found a MANDATORY code element in leaf sections (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.3) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires a MANDATORY code element with MANADATORY code, codeSystem and displayName in leaf sections. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.3)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found a MANDATORY code element with MANADATORY code, codeSystem and displayName in leaf sectionsS. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports 7.3) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires NONE or ONE entry element in each Leaf section (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found ONE entry element in the leaf section. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1) (PASS)
sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires ONE entry element with CORRECT templateId (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found ONE entry element with CORRECT templateId. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1) (PASS)
sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires ONE entry/act with classCode = ACT and moodCode = EVN (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found ONE entry/act with classCode = ACT and moodCode = EVN (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires ONE code element in every act element(Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found ONE code element in every act element (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1) (PASS)

sch:assert.test: count(cda:statusCode) = 1 and (cda:statusCode/@code = 'active' or cda:statusCode/@code = 'completed' or cda:statusCode/@code ='aborted' or cda:statusCode/@code ='obsolete')

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires ONE act/statusCode with code = 'active' or 'completed' or 'aborted' or 'obsolete'. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1)

sch:report.test: count(cda:statusCode) = 1 and (cda:statusCode/@code = 'active' or cda:statusCode/@code = 'completed' or cda:statusCode/@code ='aborted' or cda:statusCode/@code ='obsolete')

sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found ONE act/statusCode with code = 'active' or 'completed' or 'aborted' or 'obsolete'. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1) (PASS)

sch:rule.sch:assert: ERR: Requires code equals to either R or V when act/confidentialitiyCode element presents.(Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1)
sch:rule.sch:report: CTX: Found code equals to either R or V when act/confidentialitiyCode element presents. (Lab TF Sharing Lab Reports Table 9.2-1) (PASS)
